description: Amendments to planning permission dated 24 January 2023 (RN: 22/07450/FULL) for formation of a new roof terrace to serve existing flats, including new railings, timber screening, openable sliding rooflights, existing lift overrun enclosure extended to allow for a new internal staircase, alteration of existing extract vent, roof slate at lower roof level replaced, replacement timber double glazed windows including blocking in a window and the formation of new windows to suit the reconfigured internal layout, replacement residential entrance door, 2 new air source heat pumps (ASHP) at roof level, trellis with planting and green roof; NAMELY, to vary the type of rooflight, to provide an alternative access from the top floor residential unit to roof level including new door, to adjust the position of the proposed AOV and to vary the position of two of the lead dormers.
